column1: Race
Blood Elf
LVL: 2
Hailing from Dalaran ; this ugly champion anticipates to discover their family.
Their long hair fall upon their  mail hazel soldier outfit that looks like it was stolen from a dungeon; but perfectly fits their relatively small eyes.
On snowy days; they absolutely detest to talk ; Their easy-going personality makes it worse.
Race
Draenai
LVL: 20
Coming from Darkshore ; this maniacal auctioneer ventures to learn the truth about their future.
Their short hair fall-sort upon their  ripped dark suggestive outfit which bears the crest of your family. It is a perfect fit with their abnormaly large arms.
During night-time; they are forced by nature to act ; Their weird personality makes it really obnoxious.
Race
Troll
LVL: 6
Born in Dragonblight ; this immortal tavern owner wants to vanquish their destiny.
They wear a luxurious transparent pair of gloves that  outshines their abnormaly small nose.
During night-time; they dislike to sing ; Their dark personality makes it really easy.
Race
Human
LVL: 20
Coming from The Jade Forest ; this cunning leatherworker spares no effort to to conquer their past.
Their body is protected by a  mail dark pair of gloves that bears a crest. It looks absurd compared to their beautiful toes.
On snowy days; they absolutely love to act ; Their ingenious personality makes it really easy.
Race
Night Elf
LVL: 15
Grew up rich in Borean Tundra ; this peaceful salesperson hopes to conquer their origins.
Their old skin is covered by a cloth blue soldier outfit which bears a royal crest. It seems to have a weird effect on  their tiny nails.
On rainy days; they always cry ; Their shy personality makes it a milion times worse.
Race
Draenai
LVL: 14
Belonging to the poorest family of Suramar ; this generous tailor yearns to profit from their past.
They wear a plate red legplate that looks like it was stolen from a dungeon; but seems to have a weird effect on  their absurdly small legs.
On snowy days; they dislike to go fishing ; Their shady personality makes it the funniest thing in the world.
Race
Worgen
LVL: 11
Born in Azshara ; this spiritualistic herbalist wants to vanquish their ego.
Their apparel consists of a ruggy hazel helmet that was reported stolen by authorities. It seems to have a weird effect on  their fake-looking eyebrows.
On snowy days; they prefer to talk ; Their rhetorical personality makes it really easy.
Race
Worgen
LVL: 4
Living with his mother in Molten Front ; this immortal champion strives to unearth their destiny.
Their body is protected by a  ruggy dark pair of trousers that resembles the gear of the late queen. It destroys the appearance coherency with  their relatively big nails.
Whenever they are feeling sad; they absolutely love to sing ; Their weird personality makes it easier.
Race
Human
LVL: 19
Hitchhiking to Thousand Needles ; this dominant inscriptionist seeks to learn the truth about their true destiny.
Their body is protected by a  woolen blue pair of shoulderpads which bears the crest of your family. It destroys the appearance coherency with  their terrifyingly big arms.
When they take a shower; they hate to act ; Their unique personality makes it worse.
Race
Goblin
LVL: 11
Originating from Durotar ; this bossy archaeologist wants to conquer their true destiny.
Their old skin is covered by a heavy hazel legplate which  looks absurd compared to their fake-looking toes.
During daytime; they always go questing ; Their malicious personality makes it more fun.
Race
Night Elf
LVL: 7
Hailing from Deadwind Pass ; this persistant low-class craves to destroy their destiny.
They wear a ruggy dark outfit that looks familiar. It destroys the appearance coherency with  their small eyes.
During daytime; they most definitely will go sightseeing ; Their brilliant personality makes it the funniest thing in the world.
Race
Goblin
LVL: 8
Her family gave birth to her in Kun-Lai Summit ; this faithful champion craves to find their real family.
Their youthful skin is covered by a ripped dark dog outfit which  does not suit their unaturally smooth nosedrills.
During night-time; they have to act ; Their lazy personality makes it less difficult.

LVL: 11
Hailing from Thousand Needles ; this pettiful fisher aspires to learn the truth about their ego.

On snowy days; they love to explore ; Their annoying personality makes it more difficult.

Originating from Dun Morrogh ; this disloyal tavern worker expects to discover their rage.
They wear a plate orange legplate which was recently auctioned. It perfectly fits their abnormaly large nose.
On rainy days; they prefer to act ; Their rhetorical personality makes it harder.

LVL: 1
Fled from Arathi Highlands ; this obnoxious lockpicker wishes to find their true origins.
Their apparel consists of a mail black helmet that looks familiar. It destroys the appearance coherency with  their huge cheek.
During night-time; they are forced by nature to dance ; Their unique personality makes it more fun.

LVL: 8
Living with his father in Vol'dun ; this evil archaeologist yearns to learn the truth about their family.

Whenever they are feeling alone; they prefer to exercise ; Their brilliant personality makes it really obnoxious.

Born in Silithus ; this caustic mid-class plans to unearth their true destiny.

During daytime; they always sing ; Their weird personality makes it a milion times worse.

Their apparel consists of a luxurious pink goblin outfit that bears a royal crest. It perfectly fits their absurdly small nose.
During daytime; they most definitely will act ; Their rhetorical personality makes it the most exciting thing in the world.
